mapper.select: SELECT DM.DELIVERY_NUMBER AS deliveryNumber, DM.SUSER_NO AS suserNo, DM.MAX_PICKUP_TIME AS maxPickupTime, DM.MAX_ARRIVE_TIME AS maxArriveTime, DM.DELIVERY_PRICE AS deliveryPrice, DM.DELIVERY_STATE AS deliveryState, DC.DEL_CONTENT_PICTURE AS delContentPicture, DC.DEL_CONTENT_NAME AS delContentName, SU.SUSER_ID AS suserId, SU.SUSER_NAME AS suserName, SU.SUSER_PHOTO AS suserPhoto, SRM.TOTAL_STAR AS totalStar, UG.GRADE_CODE AS gradeCode, (SELECT LOCATION_ADDRESS FROM DEL_LOCATION_MAN DLM WHERE DLM.DELIVERY_NUMBER = DM.DELIVERY_NUMBER AND DLM.LOCATION_TYPE = 1) AS startPlace, (SELECT LOCATION_ADDRESS FROM DEL_LOCATION_MAN DLM WHERE DLM.DELIVERY_NUMBER = DM.DELIVERY_NUMBER AND DLM.LOCATION_TYPE = 2) AS arrivePlace, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DELIVERY_MAN DM WHERE DELIVERY_STATE = 7) AS delicnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DEL_CANDIDATE CAND WHERE CAND.DELIVERY_NUMBER = DM.DELIVERY_NUMBER) AS candiNum, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(REVIEW_STAR),1) FROM SENDER_DETAIL_REVIEW_MAN SDRM WHERE SDRM.REVIEW_NUMBER = SRM.REVIEW_NUMBER AND SRM.SUSER_NO = DM.SUSER_NO) AS sendAvrPoint FROM DELIVERY_MAN DM INNER JOIN DEL_CONTENT_INFO DC ON DM.DELIVERY_NUMBER = DC.DELIVERY_NUMBER INNER JOIN SENDUSER SU ON DM.SUSER_NO = SU.SUSER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN SENDER_REVIEW_MAN SRM ON DM.SUSER_NO = SRM.SUSER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_GRADE UG ON UG.SUSER_NO = SU.SUSER_NO
SELECT LOCATION_LATITUDE AS loLati, LOCATION_LONGITUDE AS loLongi, LOCATION_TYPE AS loType FROM DEL_LOCATION_MAN WHERE DELIVERY_NUMBER = #{deliveryNumber}
